author: muddlebee
content:
Hi. updates for this week.

I was exploring possible use cases of my project proposal https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-one/blob/master/notes/muddlebee/stage-1-project-discovery.md#author-an-eip-and-corresponding-poc-implementation-for-creating-a-transparent-system-to-contextualise-and-rank-ideas.  Got two more potential use cases(patents/copyright)


Got some better view/feedbacks/ideas around the same during discussion in #general at Ethereum Cats & Herders.  Next Im planning to explore more on getting the `Understand the relationship between ideas and patents` and understand the infrastructure/architecture and in-depth study of `NFTs`.(NFT use case is somehow related to use case of my proposal)

Also had a bried discussion/chat with Anett Rolikova founder of Ethereum Magicians. She's currently working https://www.nftstandards.wtf/
> Wiki of NFT Standards and everything related to Non Fungible Tokens, infrastructure, vulnerabilities, ideas, metadata
I will be helping her in improving the documentation of NFTs also which will help me gain better understanding of NFTs.

Nothing much for the week. I am occupied in shifting to a new place, since the offices here have reopened post COVID.
